solution: For password reset issues: 1) Check spam/junk folder, 2) Try using a different email, 3) Clear browser cache and cookies, 4) Wait 10 minutes between reset attempts. If issues persist, we can manually reset your password.

Account lockouts are automatic after 5 failed login attempts. We can unlock your account immediately. For security, we'll need to verify your identity first. Please reply with your account registration details.

We apologize for any billing confusion. Duplicate charges usually occur due to payment method changes or subscription renewals. We'll investigate your account and process any necessary refunds within 3-5 business days.

Our Pro plan includes advanced features like API access and priority support, while Enterprise adds custom integrations and dedicated account management. I'll send you a detailed comparison chart and can schedule a call to discuss your specific needs.

Thank you for your feature suggestion! We collect all user feedback and our product team reviews requests quarterly. While I can't guarantee implementation timelines, your input helps shape our roadmap. I'll add your request to our feature backlog.
